actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage the patronage of the hospitality, restaurant, and entertainment industries of New York City.
short_title: I Love New York Tax Deduction Act of 2001

summary.text: I Love New York Tax Deduction Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the allowable deduction for business meal and entertainment expenses and allow a deduction for personal meal and entertainment expenses when such meal or entertainment is furnished in New York City.

titles.title: I Love New York Tax Deduction Act of 2001
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage the patronage of the hospitality, restaurant, and entertainment industries of New York City.
